parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Wine. A primary word (yayin); 'wine'.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
An outburst of passion, wrath. From thuo; passion.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To mix, mingle, pour out for drinking. Prolonged form of a more primary kerao ker-ah'-o; to mingle, i.e. to pour out.
Unmixed, undiluted, pure. Undiluted.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A drinking cup, the contents of the cup; fig: the portion which God allots.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From oregomai; properly, desire, i.e., violent passion (justifiable) abhorrence); by implication punishment.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To examine, as by torture; I torment; I buffet, as of waves. From basanos; to torture.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
And, even, also, namely.
Brimstone, sulfur. Probably neuter of theios; sulphur.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(originally: a little lamb, but diminutive force was lost), a lamb. Diminutive from aren; a lambkin.
